MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RequestCallDataUsage() cil managed

Docs.summary: Issues a request to the Connection.VideoProvider to retrieve the cumulative data usage for the video component of the current call (in bytes).

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RequestCameraCapabilities() cil managed

Docs.summary: Issues a request to the Connection.VideoProvider to retrieve the capabilities of the current camera.

Public MustOverride Sub SendSessionModifyRequest (requestProfile As VideoProfile)

Docs.summary: Issues a request to modify the properties of the current video session.
